fullplot: Eventually everyone runs out of time - but before that happens to you, make some time to go on a journey, a journey through directorial duo Becky Sloan and Joseph Pelling's existentialist universe of temporal confusion, TV guides and bathtime. A sequel to Becky & Joe's original mind-bending viral hit "Don't Hug Me I'm Scared", which has amassed over 13 million views on YouTube to date and inspired a wave of related videos, Don't Hug Me I'm Scared II" is an unsettling lesson in the dangers of time and the perils of metaphysical introspection.

title: Don't Hug Me I'm Scared 2: Time
